pages.text: An addon to the explosion resistance modifier: use a Nether Star on a frame or illusion block to make it immune to entity destruction, such as the destructiveness of the Wither and the Ender Dragon. $(l)However, the nether star does not increase the explosion resistance of the affected block.$() This has to be done with the explosion resistance modifiers!

pages.title: Unstoppable!
pages.text: $(l)$(#f00)The nether Star will be consumed in the action!$() However, the prerequisite for this is that the frame or illusion block has already been "filled" with a block and imitates it. You cannot make an empty frame resist the power of the bosses.
